<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Scatter Scree](/Spells.aspx?ID=990)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 127 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** two contiguous 5-foot cubes

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You evoke a jumble of rocks in the area. The scattering rocks deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier to creatures in the area, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature can Interact to clear a square of this scree.

 If you cast this spell again, any previous _scatter scree_ you have cast ends.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Scatter Scree
